name: Yom | Yomu Style
description:
Style lora trained on images from the artist Yom/Yomu. Dont really have any recommendations for this one. The style seems to apply pretty universally after using the yomu_(sgt_epper) tag. Lora strength of 1 should be fine for AOM3A2. Look at the generation info for my example images for other prompts/models


Trained using AOM2 and some random settings I stole from a youtube video.

I still have absolutely no idea what I am doing.

meta.prompt: masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed, illustration, 1girl, looking at viewer, portrait, upper body,  yomu \(sgt epper\), <lora:YomStyle-000010:1>
